member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSpectralFlatnessCondition
member.summary: Specifies the test condition for Spectral Flatness measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSpectralFlatnessCondition.Normal
member.summary: Frequency range and maximum ripple defined in the section 6.4.2.4.1, Table 6.4.2.4.1-1 of 3GPP 38.101-1 and section 6.4.2.4.1, Table 6.4.2.4.1-1 of 3GPP 38.101-2 are used.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSpectralFlatnessCondition.Extreme
member.summary: Frequency range and maximum ripple defined in the section 6.4.2.4.1, Table 6.4.2.4.1-2 of 3GPP 38.101-1 and section 6.4.2.4.1, Table 6.4.2.4.1-2 of 3GPP 38.101-2 are used.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSpectrumInverted
member.summary: Specifies whether the spectrum of the signal being measured is inverted. This happens when I and Q component of the baseband complex signal is swapped.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSpectrumInverted.False
member.summary: The signal being measured is not inverted.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSpectrumInverted.True
member.summary: The signal being measured is inverted and measurement will correct it by swapping the I and Q components.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSymbolClockErrorEstimationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to estimate symbol clock error. This method is ignored when the Common Clock Source Enabled method is and the Frequency Error Estimation method is Disabled, in which case, symbol clock error is not estimated. If symbol clock error is absent in the signal to be analyzed, you may disable symbol clock error estimation to reduce measurement time or to avoid measurement inaccuracy due to error in symbol clock error estimation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSymbolClockErrorEstimationEnabled.False
member.summary: Indicates that symbol clock error estimation and correction is disabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSymbolClockErrorEstimationEnabled.True
member.summary: Indicates that symbol clock error estimation and correction is enabled.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSynchronizationMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement is performed from slot or frame boundary.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSynchronizationMode.Slot
member.summary: The measurement is performed over the starting at the from the slot boundary. If you set the method to , the measurement expects the digital trigger at the slot boundary.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccSynchronizationMode.Frame
member.summary: The measurement is performed over the ModAcc Meas Length starting at ModAcc Meas Offset from the frame boundary. If you set the Trigger Type method to , the measurement expects the digital trigger at the frame boundary.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccTimingTrackingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether timing tracking is enabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccTimingTrackingEnabled.False
member.summary: The time tracking is disabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModAccTimingTrackingEnabled.True
member.summary: The time tracking is done per symbol.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModTimingTrackingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether timing tracking is enabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModTimingTrackingEnabled.False
member.summary: The time tracking is disabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXModTimingTrackingEnabled.True
member.summary: The time tracking is done per symbol.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObw
member.summary: Represents the OBW measurement.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObw.Configuration
member.summary: Gets the instance that provides methods to configure the OBW measurement.

member.name: P:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObw.Results
member.summary: Gets the instance that provides methods to fetch and read the OBW measurement results.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAmplitudeCorrectionType
member.summary: Specifies whether the amplitude of frequency bins in the spectrum used by the measurement is corrected for external attenuation at RF center frequency or corrected for external attenuation at individual frequency bins. Use the RFmxInstr_CfgExternalAttenuationTable function to configure the external attenuation table.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAmplitudeCorrectionType.RFCenterFrequency
member.summary: All the frequency bins in the spectrum are compensated with a single external attenuation value that corresponds to the RF center frequency.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAmplitudeCorrectionType.SpectrumFrequencyBin
member.summary: An individual frequency bin in the spectrum is compensated with the external attenuation value corresponding to that frequency.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable averaging for the OBW measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingEnabled.False
member.summary: The measurement is performed on a single acquisition.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingEnabled.True
member.summary: The OBW measurement uses the value of the method as the number of acquisitions over which the OBW measurement is averaged.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingType
member.summary: Specifies the averaging type for averaging multiple spectrum acquisitions. The averaged spectrum is used for the OBW measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingType.Rms
member.summary: The power spectrum is linearly averaged. RMS averaging reduces signal fluctuations but not the noise floor.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingType.Log
member.summary: The power spectrum is averaged in a logarithmic scale.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingType.Scalar
member.summary: The square root of the power spectrum is averaged.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingType.Maximum
member.summary: The peak power in the spectrum at each frequency bin is retained from one acquisition to the next.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwAveragingType.Minimum
member.summary: The lowest power in the spectrum at each frequency bin is retained from one acquisition to the next.

Upon return, contains the bandwidththat occupies the specified percentage of the total power of the signal. This value is expressed in Hz. The occupied bandwidth is calculated using the following equation:Occupied bandwidth = Stop frequency - Start frequency

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwResults.FetchSpectrum(System.String,System.Double,NationalInstruments.Spectrum{System.Single}@)
member.summary: Fetches the spectrum used for OBW measurements.
member.param:
Specifies a selector string comprising of the result name. If you do not specify the result name, the default result instance is used.
Example:
""
"result::r1"
You can use the method to build the selector string.

Specifies the timeout for fetching the specified measurement. This value is expressed in seconds. Set this value to an appropriate time, longer than expected for fetching the measurement. A value of -1 specifies that the method waits until the measurement is complete.
Upon return, contains the spectrum.
member.returns: Returns the status code of this method. The status code either indicates success or describes a warning condition.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXObwResults.FetchMeasurement(System.String,System.Double,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary:
Returns the occupied bandwidth, absolute power, start frequency, and stop frequency of a component carrier or subblock.
Use "subblock(n)" as the selector string to read results from this method.
member.param:
Specifies a selector string comprising of the result name, and subblock number. If you do not specify the result name, the default result instance is used. Example:
"subblock0"
"result::r1/subblock0"
You can use the method to build the selector string.

Specifies the timeout for fetching the specified measurement. This value is expressed in seconds. Set this value to an appropriate time, longer than expected for fetching the measurement. A value of -1 specifies that the method waits until the measurement is complete.

Upon return, contains the bandwidththat occupies the specified percentage of the total power of the signal. This value is expressed in Hz. The occupied bandwidth is calculated using the following equation:
Occupied bandwidth = Stop frequency - Start frequency
Upon return, contains the power measured over the integration bandwidth of the component carrier. This value is expressed in dBm.
Upon return, contains the start frequency of the occupied bandwidth of carrier/subblock. This value is expressed in Hz.
Upon return, contains the stop frequency of the occupied bandwidth of carrier/subblock. This value is expressed in Hz.
member.returns: Returns the status code of this method. The status code either indicates success or describes a warning condition.

member.name: T:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId
member.summary: Specifies all the attribute identifiers.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SelectedPorts
member.summary: Specifies the instrument port to be configured to acquire a signal. Use RFmxInstr_GetAvailablePorts function to get the valid port names.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.CenterFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the center frequency of the acquired RF signal for a single carrier. This value is expressed in Hz. For intraband carrier aggregation, this method specifies the reference frequency of a subblock. Depending on the Subblock Frequency Definition method, the center frequency can either be absolute or relative to first subblock's center frequency. All component carrier frequencies within the subblock are defined with respect to this frequency.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ReferenceLevel
member.summary: Specifies the reference level which represents the maximum expected power of the RF input signal. This value is expressed in dBm for RF devices and Vpk-pk for baseband devices.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ExternalAttenuation
member.summary: Specifies the attenuation of a switch (or cable) connected to the RF IN connector of the signal analyzer. This value is expressed in dB. For more information about attenuation, refer to the Attenuation and Signal Levels topic for your device in the NI RF Vector Signal Analyzers Help.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ReferenceLevelHeadroom
member.summary: Specifies the margin RFmx adds to the method. The margin avoids clipping and overflow warnings if the input signal exceeds the configured reference level.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.TriggerType
member.summary: Specifies the type of trigger to be used for signal acquisition.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.DigitalEdgeTriggerSource
member.summary: Specifies the source terminal for the digital edge trigger. This method is used only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.DigitalEdgeTriggerEdge
member.summary: Specifies the active edge for the trigger. This method is used only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.IQPowerEdgeTriggerSource
member.summary: Specifies the channel from which the device monitors the trigger.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.IQPowerEdgeTriggerLevel
member.summary: Specifies the power level at which the device triggers. This value is expressed in dB when you set the method to ; and in dBm when you set the IQ Power Edge Level Type method to . The device asserts the trigger when the signal exceeds the level specified by the value of this method, taking into consideration the specified slope. This method is used only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.IQPowerEdgeTriggerLevelType
member.summary: Specifies the reference for the method. The IQ Power Edge Level Type method is used only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.IQPowerEdgeTriggerSlope
member.summary: Specifies whether the device asserts the trigger when the signal power is rising or when it is falling. The device asserts the trigger when the signal power exceeds the specified level with the slope you specify.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.TriggerDelay
member.summary: Specifies the trigger delay time. This value is expressed in seconds. If the delay is negative, the measurement acquires pre-trigger samples. If the delay is positive, the measurement acquires post-trigger samples.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.TriggerMinimumQuietTimeMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement computes the minimum quiet time used for triggering.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.TriggerMinimumQuietTimeDuration
member.summary: Specifies the time duration for which the signal must be quiet before the signal analyzer arms the I/Q power edge trigger. This value is expressed in seconds. If you set the method to , the signal is quiet below the trigger level. If you set the IQ Power Edge Slope method to , the signal is quiet above the trigger level.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.LinkDirection
member.summary: Specifies the link direction of the received signal.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.gNodeBCategory
member.summary: Specifies the downlink gNodeB (base station) category. Refer to the 3GPP 38.104 specification for more information about gNodeB category.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.TransmitAntennaToAnalyze
member.summary: Specifies the physical antenna that is currently connected to the analyzer.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PowerClass
member.summary: Specifies the power class for the UE as specified in section 6.2 of 3GPP 38.101-1/2/3 specification.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PiBy2BpskPowerBoostEnabled
member.summary: Specifies the power boost for PI/2 BPSK signal when you set the method to . This method is valid only for uplink direction.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AutoResourceBlockDetectionEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether the values of modulation type, number of resource block clusters, resource block offsets, and number of resource blocks are auto-detected by the measurement or configured by you.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.DownlinkChannelConfigurationMode
member.summary: Specifies the downlink channel configuration mode.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AutoIncrementCellIDEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether the cell ID of component carrier is auto calculated and configured by the measurement or configured by the user.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.NumberOfSubblocks
member.summary: Specifies the number of subblocks configured in intraband non-contiguous carrier aggregation scenarios.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SubblockFrequencyDefinition
member.summary: Specifies if the subblock center frequency definition is an absolute frequency or relative to the absolute frequency of the first subblock. This method is ignored for the first subblock and is considered to be absolute by the measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SubblockTransmitLOFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the frequency of the transmitters local oscillator. This value is expressed in Hz. The frequency is defined per subblock and relative to the respective subblock center frequency.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PhaseCompensationFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the frequency used for phase compensation of the signal when you set the method to . This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.FrequencyRange
member.summary: Specifies whether to use channel bandwidth and subcarrier spacing configuration supported in the frequency range 1 (sub 6 GHz) or the frequency range 2 (above 24 GHz).

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.Band
member.summary: Specifies the evolved universal terrestrial radio access (E-UTRA) or NR operating frequency band of a subblock as specified in section 5.2 of the 3GPP 38.101-1/2/3 specification. Band determines the spectral flatness mask and spectral emission mask.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SubblockEndcNominalSpacingAdjustment
member.summary: Specifies the adjustment of the center frequency for adjacent E-UTRA and NR Channels in case of nominal spacing. The value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChannelRaster
member.summary: Specifies the subblock channel raster which is used for computing nominal spacing between aggregated carriers as specified in section 5.4A.1 of 3GPP 38.101-1/2 specification and section 5.4.1.2 of 3GPP TS 38.104 specification. The value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ComponentCarrierSpacingType
member.summary: Specifies the spacing between adjacent component carriers (CCs) within a subblock.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ComponentCarrierAtCenterFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the index of the component carrier having its center at the user-configured center frequency. The measurement uses this method along with method to calculate the value of the . This method is ignored if you set the CC Spacing Type method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.NumberOfComponentCarriers
member.summary: Specifies the number of component carriers configured within a subblock. Set this method to 1 for single carrier.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.DownlinkTestModel
member.summary: Specifies the NR test model type when you set the Channel Configuration Mode method to Test Model. Refer to section 4.9.2 of the 3GPP 38.141 specification for more information regarding test model configurations.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.DownlinkTestModelDuplexScheme
member.summary: Specifies the duplexing technique of the signal being measured. Refer to section 4.9.2 of 3GPP 38.141 specification for more information regarding test model configurations based on duplex scheme.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ComponentCarrierBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the channel bandwidth of the signal being measured. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ComponentCarrierFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the offset of the component carrier from the subblock center frequency that you configure in the Center Frequency method. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ComponentCarrierRadioAccessType
member.summary: Specifies if a carrier is a NR or an E-UTRA carrier while using dual connectivity (EN-DC) signal.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.CellID
member.summary: Specifies a physical layer cell identity.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ReferenceGridSubcarrierSpacing
member.summary: Specifies the subcarrier spacing of the reference resource grid when you set the Reference Grid Alignment Mode method to Manual. This should be the largest subcarrier spacing used in the component carrier. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ReferenceGridStart
member.summary: Specifies the reference resource grid start relative to Reference Point A in terms of resource block offset when you set the Reference Grid Alignment Mode method to Manual. Center of subcarrier 0 in common resource block 0 is considered as Reference Point A.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.NumberOfBandwidthParts
member.summary: Specifies the number of bandwidth parts present in the component carrier.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.BandwidthPartSubcarrierSpacing
member.summary: Specifies the subcarrier spacing of the bandwidth part used in the component carrier.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.BandwidthPartCyclicPrefixMode
member.summary: Specifies the cyclic prefix (CP) duration and the number of symbols in a slot for the signal being measured.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.GridStart
member.summary: Specifies the resource grid start relative to Reference Point A in terms of resource block offset when you set the Reference Grid Alignment Mode method to Manual.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.BandwidthPartResourceBlockOffset
member.summary: Specifies the resource block offset of a bandwidth part relative to the resource method.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.BandwidthPartNumberOfResourceBlocks
member.summary: Sets the number of consecutive resource blocks in a bandwidth part.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.NumberOfUsers
member.summary: Specifies the number of users present in the bandwidth part.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.Rnti
member.summary: Specifies the RNTI.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.NumberOfPuschConfigurations
member.summary: Specifies the number of PUSCH slot configurations.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschTransformPrecodingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether transform precoding is enabled. Enable transform precoding when analyzing a DFT-s-OFDM waveform.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschNumberOfResourceBlockClusters
member.summary: Specifies the number of clusters of resource allocations with each cluster including one or more consecutive resource blocks. This method is ignored if you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschResourceBlockOffset
member.summary: Specifies the starting resource block number of a PUSCH cluster. This method is ignored if you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschNumberOfResourceBlocks
member.summary: Specifies the number of consecutive resource blocks in a physical uplink shared channel (PUSCH) cluster. This method is ignored if you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschModulationType
member.summary: Specifies the modulation scheme used in the physical uplink shared channel (PUSCH) of the signal being measured.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsReleaseVersion
member.summary: Specifies the 3GGP release version for PUSCH DMRS.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsAntennaPorts
member.summary: Specifies the antenna ports used for DMRS transmission.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsPowerMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the value of method is calculated based on the method or specified by you.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsPower
member.summary: Specifies the factor which boosts the PUSCH DMRS REs. This value is expressed in dB. This method is ignored if you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsNumberOfCdmGroups
member.summary: Specifies the number of CDM groups, when you set the method to , otherwise it is coerced to 2.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsScramblingIDMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the configured Scrambling ID is honored or the Cell ID is used for reference signal generation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsScramblingID
member.summary: Specifies the value of scrambling ID. This method is valid only when you set the method to .

member.summary: Specifies the value of PUSCH DMRS nSCID used for reference signal generation. This method is valid only when you set the method to .

member.summary: Specifies whether the group hopping is enabled. This method is valid only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PuschDmrsSequenceHoppingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether the sequence hopping is enabled. This method is valid only when you set the method to .

member.summary: Specifies whether PUSCH DMRS PUSCH ID is based on or specified by you. This method is valid only when you set the method to .

member.summary: Specifies the value of PUSCH DMRS PUSCH ID used for reference signal generation. This method is valid only when you set the method to and method to .

member.summary: Specifies the factor by which the PUSCH PTRS REs are boosted. This value is expressed in dB. This method is valid only if you set the method to .

member.summary: Specifies the factor by which the PDSCH PTRS REs are boosted, compared to PDSCH REs. This value is expressed in dB. The value of this method is taken as an input when you set the method to . If you set the PDSCH PTRS Pwr Mode method to , the value is computed from other parameters.

member.summary: Specifies the symbol allocation of each slot allocation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PdschPresentInSsbResourceBlock
member.summary: Specifies whether the subset of RBs for certain symbols in a slot are occupied by SS/PBCH resources depending on the SS/PBCH block configuration. If this method is enabled, PDSCH RBs are allocated in the remaining symbols of this RB subset. If this method is disabled, any RBs occupied by SS/PBCH resources are not allocated on all symbols in this slot.

member.summary: Specifies the shift index of CORESET for interleaved CCE to REG mapping.

member.summary: Specifies the number of PDCCH Configurations for a CORESET.

member.summary: Specifies the CCE aggregation level of PDCCH.

member.summary: Specifies the PDCCH CCE offset.

member.summary: Specifies the slot allocation in NR frame. This defines the indices of the allocated slots.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SsbEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether synchronization signal block (SSB) is present in the transmitted signal.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SsbCrbOffset
member.summary: Specifies the CRB offset for the SS/PBCH block relative to the reference Point A in units of 15 kHz or 60 kHz resource blocks for frequency range 1 and frequency range 2 respectively.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SubcarrierSpacingCommon
member.summary: Specifies the basic unit of method for frequency range 2. The method refers to the MIB control element subCarrierSpacingCommon in 3GPP TS 38.331.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SsbSubcarrierOffset
member.summary: Specifies an additional subcarrier offset for the SS/PBCH block in units of resource blocks of 15 kHz or subcarrier spacing given by SSB Subcarrier Common method for frequency range 1 and frequency range 2 respectively.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SsbPeriodicity
member.summary: Specifies the repetition duration of the SS/PBCH block transmit pattern.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SsbPattern
member.summary: Specifies the candidate SS/PBCH blocks with different subcarrier spacing configurations as defined in the section 4.1 of 3GPP TS 38.213 specification.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SsbActiveBlocks
member.summary: Specifies the SSB burst(s) indices for the SSB pattern that needs to be transmitted.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PssPower
member.summary: Specifies the power scaling value for the primary synchronization symbol in the SS/PBCH block. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SssPower
member.summary: Specifies the power scaling value for the secondary synchronization symbol in the SS/PBCH block. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PbchPower
member.summary: Specifies the power scaling value for the PBCH REs in the SS/PBCH block. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PbchDmrsPower
member.summary: Specifies the power scaling value for the PBCH DMRS symbols in the SS/PBCH block. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccMeasurementEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the ModAcc measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccMulticarrierFilterEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to use the filter in single carrier configurations to minimize leakage into the carrier. Measurement ignores this method, if number of carriers is set to more than 1 or if you set the method to , where in the multi carrier filter will always be used.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccFrequencyErrorEstimation
member.summary: Specifies the operation mode of frequency error estimation. If frequency error is absent in the signal to be analyzed, you may disable frequency estimation to reduce measurement time or to avoid measurement inaccuracy due to error in frequency error estimation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccSymbolClockErrorEstimationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to estimate symbol clock error. This method is ignored when the Common Clock Source Enabled method is and the Frequency Error Estimation method is Disabled, in which case, symbol clock error is not estimated. If symbol clock error is absent in the signal to be analyzed, you may disable symbol clock error estimation to reduce measurement time or to avoid measurement inaccuracy due to error in symbol clock error estimation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccIQOriginOffsetEstimationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to estimate the IQ origin offset. If IQ origin offset is absent in the signal to be analyzed, you may disable IQ origin offset estimation to reduce measurement time or to avoid measurement inaccuracy due to error in IQ origin offset estimation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccIQImpairmentsEstimationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to estimate the IQ impairments such as IQ gain imbalance and quadrature skew. If IQ impairments is absent in the signal to be analyzed, you may disable IQ impairments estimation to reduce measurement time or to avoid measurement inaccuracy due to error in IQ impairments estimation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccMagnitudeAndPhaseErrorEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to measure the magnitude and the phase error.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccSynchronizationMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement is performed from slot or frame boundary.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccMeasurementLengthUnit
member.summary: Specifies the units in which measurement offset and measurement length are specified.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccMeasurementOffset
member.summary: Specifies the measurement offset to skip from the synchronization boundary. The synchronization boundary is specified by the method. The unit for this is specified by ModAcc Measurement Length Unit.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccMeasurementLength
member.summary: Specifies the measurement length in units specified by Measurement Length Unit method.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccSpectrumInverted
member.summary: Specifies whether the spectrum of the signal being measured is inverted. This happens when I and Q component of the baseband complex signal is swapped.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccChannelEstimationType
member.summary: Specifies the method used for channel estimation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccPhaseTrackingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether phase tracking is enabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccTimingTrackingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether timing tracking is enabled.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccEvmUnit
member.summary: Specifies the units of the EVM results.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccFftWindowType
member.summary: Specifies the FFT window type used for EVM calculation.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccFftWindowOffset
member.summary: Specifies the position of the FFT window used to calculate the EVM when method is set to . The offset is expressed as a percentage of the cyclic prefix length. If you set this method to 0, the EVM window starts at the end of cyclic prefix. If you set this method to 100, the EVM window starts at the beginning of cyclic prefix.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccFftWindowLength
member.summary: Specifies the FFT window length (W). This value is expressed as a percentage of the cyclic prefix length. This method is used when you set the method to , where it is needed to calculate the EVM using two different FFT window positions, Delta_C-W/2, and Delta_C+W/2.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccDCSubcarrierRemovalEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether the DC subcarrier is removed from the EVM results.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccCommonClockSourceEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether same reference clock is used for local oscillator and digital-to-analog converter. When same reference clock is used the Carrier Frequency Offset is proportional to Sample Clock Error.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccSpectralFlatnessCondition
member.summary: Specifies the test condition for Spectral Flatness measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccCompositeResultsIncludeDmrs
member.summary: Specifies whether the DMRS resource elements are included for composite EVM and magnitude and phase error results and traces.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccCompositeResultsIncludePtrs
member.summary: Specifies whether the PTRS resource elements are included for composite EVM and magnitude and phase error results and traces.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccAveragingEnabled
member.summary: Enables averaging for the measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccAveragingCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of acquisitions used for averaging when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccAllTracesEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the traces to be stored and retrieved after performing the ModAcc measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccNumberOfAnalysisThreads
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of threads used for parallelism for the ModAcc measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositeRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length. If ModAcc Composite Results Include DMRS method and ModAcc Composite Results Include PTRS method are set to False, EVM is computed only for the shared channel.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length. If ModAcc Composite Results Include DMRS method and ModAcc Composite Results Include PTRS method are set to False, EVM is computed only for the shared channel.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakEvmBwpIndex
member.summary: Returns the bandwidth part index where ModAcc Results Max Pk Composite EVM occurs.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakEvmSlotIndex
member.summary: Returns the slot index where ModAcc Results Max Pk Composite EVM occurs.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakEvmSymbolIndex
member.summary: Returns the symbol index where ModAcc Results Max Pk Composite EVM occurs.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakEvmSubcarrierIndex
member.summary: Returns the subcarrier index where ModAcc Results Max Pk Composite EVM occurs.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositeRmsMagnitudeErrorMean
member.summary: Returns the RMS mean value of magnitude error calculated over measurement length on all configured channels.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakMagnitudeErrorMaximum
member.summary: Returns the peak value of magnitude error calculated over measurement length on all configured channels.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositeRmsPhaseErrorMean
member.summary: Returns the RMS mean value of Phase error calculated over measurement length on all configured channels. This value is expressed in degrees.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsCompositePeakPhaseErrorMaximum
member.summary: Returns the peak value of Phase error calculated over measurement length on all configured channels. This value is expressed in degrees.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSchSymbolPowerMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value (over ) of power calculated on OFDM symbols allocated only with the shared channel.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSchDetectedModulationType
member.summary: Returns the modulation of the shared channel user data if you set the method to ; otherwise, returns the configured modulation of the shared user data. In case of downlink test model, the modulation type specified by the 3GPP standard is returned.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPuschDataRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on PUSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PUSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on PUSCH DMRS.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPuschDmrsPeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PUSCH DMRS.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on PUSCH PTRS.

member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PUSCH PTRS.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on all QPSK modulated PDSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on all 16 QAM modulated PDSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on all 64 QAM modulated PDSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on all 256 QAM modulated PDSCH data symbols.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPdsch1024QamRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on all 1024 QAM modulated PDSCH data symbols.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPdschDataRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on PDSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PDSCH data symbols.

member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on PDSCH DMRS.

member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PDSCH DMRS.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPdschPtrsRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs calculated over measurement length on PDSCH PTRS.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPdschPtrsPeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PDSCH PTRS.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPssRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs computed over measurement length on PSS symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPssPeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on PSS symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSssRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value of RMS EVMs computed over measurement length on SSS symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSssPeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of peak EVMs calculated over measurement length on SSS symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPbchDataRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value calculated over measurement length of RMS EVMs calculated on PBCH data symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPbchDataPeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value calculated over measurement length of peak EVMs calculated on PBCH data symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPbchDmrsRmsEvmMean
member.summary: Returns the mean value calculated over measurement length of RMS EVMs calculated on PBCH DMRS symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsPbchDmrsPeakEvmMaximum
member.summary: Returns the maximum value calculated over measurement length of peak EVMs calculated on PBCH DMRS symbols. When you set the method to , the measurement returns this result as a percentage. When you set the ModAcc EVM Unit method to , the measurement returns this result in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsInBandEmissionMargin
member.summary: Returns In-Band Emission Margin of the component carrier. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSpectralFlatnessRange1MaximumToRange1Minimum
member.summary: Returns the peak-to-peak ripple of the magnitude of EVM equalizer coefficients within Range1 for the measurement unit, that has the worst ripple margin among all four ripple results defined in section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-1 specification and section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-2 specification. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSpectralFlatnessRange2MaximumToRange2Minimum
member.summary: Returns the peak-to-peak ripple of the magnitude of EVM equalizer coefficients within Range2 for the Measurement unit, that has the worst ripple margin among all four ripple results defined in section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-1 specification and section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-2 specification. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSpectralFlatnessRange1MaximumToRange2Minimum
member.summary: Returns the peak-to-peak ripple of the EVM equalizer coefficients from maximum in Range1 to minimum in Range2 for the Measurement unit that has the worst ripple margin among all four ripple results defined in 3section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-1 specification and section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-2 specification. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSpectralFlatnessRange2MaximumToRange1Minimum
member.summary: Returns the peak-to-peak ripple of the EVM equalizer coefficients from maximum in Range2 to minimum in Range1 for the Measurement unit, that has the worst ripple margin among all four ripple results defined in section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-1 specification and section 6.4.2.4.1 of 3GPP 38.101-2 specification. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSubblockInBandEmissionMargin
member.summary: Returns In-Band Emission Margin of the subblock's aggregated bandwidth. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsComponentCarrierFrequencyErrorMean
member.summary: Returns the estimated carrier frequency offset averaged over measurement length. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsComponentCarrierSymbolClockErrorMean
member.summary: Returns the estimated sample clock error averaged over measurement length. This value is expressed in ppm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsComponentCarrierIQOriginOffsetMean
member.summary: Returns the estimated IQ origin offset averaged over measurement length. This value is expressed in dBc.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsComponentCarrierIQGainImbalanceMean
member.summary: Returns the estimated IQ gain imbalance averaged over measurement length. This value is expressed in dB. IQ gain imbalance is the ratio of the amplitude of the I component to the Q component of the IQ signal being measured.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsComponentCarrierQuadratureErrorMean
member.summary: Returns the estimated quadrature error averaged over measurement length. This value is expressed in degrees. Quadrature error is the measure of skewness in degree of the I component with respect to the Q component of the IQ signal being measured.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSubblockLOComponentCarrierIndex
member.summary: Returns the index of the component carrier that includes the LO of the transmitter according to the and properties. If the LO of the transmitter doesn't fall into any component carrier of the subblock, the method returns -1. This result is valid only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSubblockLOSubcarrierIndex
member.summary: Returns the subcarrier index within the respective component carrier where the transmitter LO is located. Due to its dependence on and properties, the value can be fractional, and the LO might reside in between subcarriers of a component carrier. This result is valid only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ModAccResultsSubblockIQOriginOffsetMean
member.summary: Returns the estimated IQ origin offset averaged over measurement length in the subblock. This value is expressed in dBc. This result is valid only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpMeasurementEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the ACP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpSubblockIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the integration bandwidth of a subblock. This value is expressed in Hz. Integration bandwidth is the span from the left edge of the leftmost carrier to the right edge of the rightmost carrier within the subblock.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpComponentCarrierIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the integration bandwidth of the component carrier (CC). This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNumberOfUtraOffsets
member.summary: Specifies the number of universal terrestrial radio access (UTRA) adjacent channel offsets to be configured at offset positions. For uplink ACP measurement in frequency range 2, and for downlink ACP measurement, the ACP Num UTRA Offsets has to be 0.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNumberOfEutraOffsets
member.summary: Specifies the number of evolved universal terrestrial radio access (E-UTRA) adjacent channel offsets to be configured at offset positions. For uplink ACP measurement, and for downlink ACP measurement in frequency range 2, this method has to be 0.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNumberOfNROffsets
member.summary: Specifies the number of NR adjacent channel offsets to be configured at offset positions.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNumberOfEndcOffsets
member.summary: Specifies the number of ENDC adjacent channel offsets to be configured at offset positions.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpOffsetChannelSpacingAdjustment
member.summary: Specifies the additional spacing of ACP offset channels at nominal spacing.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpOffsetFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the offset frequency of an offset channel. This value is expressed in Hz. The offset frequency is computed from the center of a reference component carrier/subblock to the center of the nearest RBW filter of the offset channel.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpOffsetIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the integration bandwidth of an offset channel. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpRbwFilterAutoBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement computes the RBW.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpRbwFilterBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the bandwidth of the RBW filter, used to sweep the acquired signal, when you set the method to . This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpRbwFilterType
member.summary: Specifies the shape of the RBW filter.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpSweepTimeAuto
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement sets the sweep time.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpSweepTimeInterval
member.summary: Specifies the sweep time when you set the method to . This value is expressed in seconds.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpMeasurementMethod
member.summary: Specifies the method for performing the ACP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNoiseCalibrationMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the noise calibration and measurement is performed manually by the user or automatically by RFmx. Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNoiseCalibrationAveragingAuto
member.summary: Specifies whether RFmx automatically computes the averaging count used for instrument noise calibration.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNoiseCalibrationAveragingCount
member.summary: Specifies the averaging count used for noise calibration when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNoiseCompensationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether RFmx compensates for the instrument noise when performing the measurement when you set method to , or when you set ACP Noise Cal Mode to and method to Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNoiseCompensationType
member.summary: Specifies the noise compensation type. Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpAveragingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable averaging for the ACP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpAveragingCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of acquisitions used for averaging when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpAveragingType
member.summary: Specifies the averaging type for averaging multiple spectrum acquisitions. The averaged spectrum is used for ACP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpMeasurementMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement calibrates the noise floor of analyzer or performs the ACP measurement. Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpFftWindow
member.summary: Specifies the FFT window type to be used to reduce spectral leakage.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpFftOverlapMode
member.summary: Specifies the overlap mode when you set the method to Sequential FFT.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpFftOverlap
member.summary: Returns the number of samples to overlap between consecutive chunks while performing FFT. This value is expressed as a percentage of method when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpIFOutputPowerOffsetAuto
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement computes an appropriate IF output power level offset for the offset channels to improve the dynamic range of the ACP measurement. This method is applicable only when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNearIFOutputPowerOffset
member.summary: Specifies the offset that is needed to adjust the IF output power levels for the offset channels that are near the carrier channel to improve the dynamic range. This value is expressed in dB. This method is applicable only when you set the method to and method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpFarIFOutputPowerOffset
member.summary: Specifies the offset that is needed to adjust the IF output power levels for the offset channels that are far from the carrier channel to improve the dynamic range. This value is expressed in dB. This method is applicable only when you set the method to and method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpSequentialFftSize
member.summary: Specifies the number of bins to be used for FFT computation, when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpAmplitudeCorrectionType
member.summary: Specifies whether the amplitude of the frequency bins, used in measurements, is corrected for external attenuation at the RF center frequency, or at the individual frequency bins. Use the RFmxInstr_CfgExternalAttenuationTable function to configure the external attenuation table.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpAllTracesEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the traces to be stored and retrieved after performing the ACP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpNumberOfAnalysisThreads
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of threads used for parallelism for the ACP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsTotalAggregatedPower
member.summary: Returns the total power of all the subblocks. This value is expressed in dBm. The power in each subblock is the sum of powers of all the frequency bins over the integration bandwidth of the subblocks. This value includes the power in the inter-carrier gaps within a subblock, but it does not include the power within the subblock gaps.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsSubblockPower
member.summary: Returns the sum of powers of all the frequency bins over the integration bandwidth of the subblock. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsComponentCarrierAbsolutePower
member.summary: Returns the power measured over the integration bandwidth of the component carrier. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsComponentCarrierRelativePower
member.summary: Returns the component carrier power relative to its subblock power. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsLowerOffsetAbsolutePower
member.summary: Returns the lower (negative) offset channel power. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsLowerOffsetRelativePower
member.summary: Returns the power in lower (negative) offset channel relative to the total aggregated power. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsUpperOffsetAbsolutePower
member.summary: Returns the upper (positive) offset channel power. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.AcpResultsUpperOffsetRelativePower
member.summary: Returns the power in the upper (positive) offset channel relative to the total aggregated power. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpMeasurementEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the channel power measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpSweepTimeAuto
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement sets the sweep time.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpSweepTimeInterval
member.summary: Specifies the sweep time when you set the method to False. This value is expressed in seconds.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpIntegrationBandwidthType
member.summary: Specifies the integration bandwidth (IBW) type used to measure the power of the acquired signal. Integration bandwidth is the frequency interval over which the power in each frequency bin is added to measure the total power in that interval.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpSubblockIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the integration bandwidth of the subblock. This value is expressed in Hz. It is the span from left edge of the integration bandwidth of the leftmost carrier to the right edge of the integration bandwidth of the rightmost carrier within a subblock.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpComponentCarrierIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the integration bandwidth of a component carrier (CC). This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpRbwFilterAutoBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement computes the RBW.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpRbwFilterBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the bandwidth of the RBW filter, used to sweep the acquired signal, when you set the method to . This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpRbwFilterType
member.summary: Specifies the shape of the digital RBW filter.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpNoiseCalibrationMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the noise calibration and measurement is performed manually by the user or automatically by RFmx. Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpNoiseCalibrationAveragingAuto
member.summary: Specifies whether RFmx automatically computes the averaging count used for instrument noise calibration.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpNoiseCalibrationAveragingCount
member.summary: Specifies the averaging count used for noise calibration when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpNoiseCompensationEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether RFmx compensates for the instrument noise when performing the measurement. To compensate for instrument noise when performing a CHP measurement, set the method to , or set the CHP Noise Cal Mode method to and the method to . Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpNoiseCompensationType
member.summary: Specifies the noise compensation type. Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpAveragingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable averaging for the CHP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpAveragingCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of acquisitions used for averaging when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpAveragingType
member.summary: Specifies the averaging type for averaging multiple spectrum acquisitions. The averaged spectrum is used for CHP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpMeasurementMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement calibrates the noise floor of analyzer or performs the CHP measurement. Refer to the measurement guidelines section in the Noise Compensation Algorithm topic for more information.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpFftWindow
member.summary: Specifies the FFT window type to be used to reduce spectral leakage.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpAmplitudeCorrectionType
member.summary: Specifies whether the amplitude of frequency bins in the spectrum used by the measurement is corrected for external attenuation at RF center frequency or corrected for external attenuation at individual frequency bins Use the RFmxInstr_CfgExternalAttenuationTable function to configure the external attenuation table.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpAllTracesEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the traces to be stored and retrieved after performing the CHP measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpNumberOfAnalysisThreads
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of threads used for parallelism for the CHP measurement. The number of threads can range from 1 to the number of physical cores. The number of threads you set may not be used in calculations. The actual number of threads used depends on the problem size, system resources, data availability, and other considerations.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpResultsTotalAggregatedPower
member.summary: Returns the total power of all the subblocks. This value is expressed in dBm. The power in each subblock is the sum of powers of all the frequency bins over the integration bandwidth of the subblocks. This value includes the power in the inter-carrier gaps within a subblock, but it does not include the power within the subblock gaps.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpResultsSubblockPower
member.summary: Returns the sum of powers of all the frequency bins over the integration bandwidth of the subblock. This includes the power in inter-carrier gaps within a subblock. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpResultsComponentCarrierAbsolutePower
member.summary: Returns the power measured over the integration bandwidth of the component carrier. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ChpResultsComponentCarrierRelativePower
member.summary: Returns the component carrier power relative to its subblock power. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwMeasurementEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the OBW measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwSpan
member.summary: Returns the frequency search space to find the OBW. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwRbwFilterAutoBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement computes the RBW.

member.summary: Specifies the bandwidth of the RBW filter used to sweep the acquired signal, when you set the method to . This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwRbwFilterType
member.summary: Specifies the shape of the digital RBW filter.

member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement sets the sweep time.

member.summary: Specifies whether to enable averaging for the OBW measurement.

member.summary: Specifies the number of acquisitions used for averaging when you set the method to .

member.summary: Specifies the averaging type for averaging multiple spectrum acquisitions. The averaged spectrum is used for the OBW measurement.

member.summary: Specifies the FFT window type to be used to reduce spectral leakage.

member.summary: Specifies whether the amplitude of frequency bins in the spectrum used by the measurement is corrected for external attenuation at RF center frequency or corrected for external attenuation at individual frequency bins. Use the RFmxInstr_CfgExternalAttenuationTable function to configure the external attenuation table.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwAllTracesEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the traces to be stored and retrieved after performing the OBW measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwNumberOfAnalysisThreads
member.summary: Specifies the maximum number of threads used for parallelism for the OBW measurement. The number of threads can range from 1 to the number of physical cores. The number of threads you set may not be used in calculations. The actual number of threads used depends on the problem size, system resources, data availability, and other considerations.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwResultsOccupiedBandwidth
member.summary: Returns the bandwidththat occupies the specified percentage of the total power of the signal. This value is expressed in Hz. The occupied bandwidth is calculated using the following equation:Occupied bandwidth = Stop frequency - Start frequency

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwResultsAbsolutePower
member.summary: Returns the total power measured in the spectrum acquired by the measurement. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwResultsStartFrequency
member.summary: Returns the start frequency of the occupied bandwidth of carrier/subblock. This value is expressed in Hz. The occupied bandwidth is calculated using the following equation:Occupied bandwidth = Stop frequency - Start frequency

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.ObwResultsStopFrequency
member.summary: Returns the stop frequency of the occupied bandwidth of carrier/subblock. This value is expressed in Hz. Occupied bandwidth is calculated using the following equation:Occupied bandwidth = Stop frequency - Start frequency

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemMeasurementEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether to enable the SEM measurement.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemUplinkMaskType
member.summary: Specifies the spectrum emission mask used in the measurement for uplink. You must set the mask type to to configure the custom offset masks. Refer to section 6.5.2 of the 3GPP 38.101 specification for more information about standard-defined mask types.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemDownlinkMaskType
member.summary: Specifies the limits to be used in the measurement for Downlink.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemDeltaFMaximum
member.summary: Specifies the stop frequency for 3rd offset segment to be used in the measurement. This method is valid only for downlink and when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemSubblockIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Returns the integration bandwidth of a subblock. This value is expressed in Hz. Integration bandwidth is the span from the left edge of the leftmost carrier to the right edge of the rightmost carrier within the subblock.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemSubblockAggregatedChannelBandwidth
member.summary: Returns the aggregated channel bandwidth of a configured subblock. This value is expressed in Hz. The aggregated channel bandwidth is the sum of the subblock integration bandwidth and the guard bands on either side of the subblock integration bandwidth.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemComponentCarrierIntegrationBandwidth
member.summary: Returns the integration bandwidth of a component carrier. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemComponentCarrierRatedOutputPower
member.summary: Specifies the rated output power (Prated, x), which is used only to choose the limit table for medium range base station. This value is expressed in dBm.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemNumberOfOffsets
member.summary: Specifies the number of SEM offset segments.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetStartFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the start frequency of an offset segment relative to the edge (single carrier) or edge (multi-carrier). This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetStopFrequency
member.summary: Specifies the stop frequency of an offset segment relative to the edge (single carrier) or edge (multi-carrier). This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetSideband
member.summary: Specifies whether the offset segment is present either on one side or on both sides of a carrier.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetRbwFilterBandwidth
member.summary: Specifies the bandwidth of the resolution bandwidth (RBW) filter used to sweep the acquired offset segment, when you set the SEM Offset RBW Auto method to False. This value is expressed in Hz.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetRbwFilterType
member.summary: Specifies the shape of a digital RBW filter.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetBandwidthIntegral
member.summary: Specifies the resolution of a spectrum to compare with the spectral mask limits as an integer multiple of the RBW.

member.summary: Specifies the relative power limit corresponding to the beginning of the offset segment. This value is expressed in dB.

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.SemOffsetRelativeLimitStop
member.summary: Specifies the relative power limit corresponding to the end of the offset segment. This value is expressed in dB.

member.summary: Specifies whether the measurement sets the sweep time.

member.summary: Specifies the sweep time when you set the method to . This value is expressed in seconds.

member.summary: Specifies whether to enable averaging for the SEM measurement.

member.summary: Specifies the number of acquisitions used for averaging when you set the method to .

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.PvtResultsAbsoluteOffPowerBefore

member.name: F:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPropertyId.TransmitterArchitecture
member.summary: Specifies the RF architecture at the transmitter in case of a multi-carrier. Each component carriers within a subblock can have separate LO or one common LO for entire subblock.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPvtResults.FetchMeasurementArray(System.String,System.Double,NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPvtMeasurementStatus[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@)
member.summary:
Fetches an array of PVT ON and OFF powers along with measurement status and burst width.
Use "subblock(n)" as the selector string to read results from this method.
member.param:
Specifies a selector string comprising of the result name, and subblock number. If you do not specify the result name, the default result instance is used. Example:
"subblock0"
"result::r1/subblock0"
You can use the method to build the selector string.

Specifies the timeout for fetching the specified measurement. This value is expressed in seconds. Set this value to an appropriate time, longer than expected for fetching the measurement. A value of -1 specifies that the method waits until the measurement is complete.
Upon return, contains the measurement status indicating whether the off power before and after is within the standard defined limit.
Upon return, contains the OFF power in the segment before the captured burst. The segment is defined as one slot prior to a short transient segment and the burst. This value is expressed in dBm.
Upon return, contains the OFF power in the segment after the captured burst. The segment is defined as one slot after the burst and a short transient segment. This value is expressed in dBm.
Upon return, contains the power of the subframes within the captured burst. This value is expressed in dBm.
Upon return, contains the width of the captured burst. This value is expressed in seconds.
member.returns: Returns the status code of this method. The status code either indicates success or describes a warning condition.

member.name: M:NationalInstruments.RFmx.NRMX.RFmxNRMXPvtResults.FetchSignalPowerTrace(System.String,System.Double,NationalInstruments.AnalogWaveform{System.Single}@,NationalInstruments.AnalogWaveform{System.Single}@)
member.niparametertypes: System.String,System.Double,ref NationalInstruments.AnalogWaveform`1[[System.Single, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]],ref NationalInstruments.AnalogWaveform`1[[System.Single, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]
member.summary:
Fetches an instantanous signal power trace along with the absolute limit for each segment in the trace as specified in section 6.5.2.4.5 of the 3GPP 36.521 specification. This value is expressed in dBm.
Use "carrier(k)" or "subblock(n)/carrier(k)" as the selector string to read this result.
member.param:
Specifies a selector string comprising of the result name, subblock number, and carrier number. If you do not specify the result name, the default result instance is used. Example:
"subblock0/carrier0"
"result::r1/subblock0/carrier0"
You can use the method to build the selector string.
Specifies the timeout for which the method waits for the measurement to complete. This value is expressed in seconds. A value of -1 specifies that the method waits until the measurement is complete.
Upon return, contains an array of the instantaneous signal power trace. This value is expressed in dBm.
Upon return, contains absolute limit for each segment in the trace as specified in section 6.5.2.4.5 of the 3GPP 36.521 specification. This value is expressed in dBm.
member.returns: Returns the status code of this method. The status code either indicates success or describes a warning condition.
